channel.title: Data Cleaning on Craig Hutton, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Data Cleaning on Craig Hutton, PhD

item.title: A Scientist's Guide to R: Step 2.1. Basic Operations & Data Structures
item.description: 1 TL;DR 2 Introduction 3 Basic Calculations 4 Logical Operators 5 Object Assignment 6 Data Structures and Object Assignment 7 basic summary statistics 8 options and the working environment 8.1 files with other delimiting characters (also .txt) 8.2 Microsoft Excel files (.xlsx, .xls) 8.3 files from SPSS, SAS, or Stata 8.4 fixed width files (.txt, .gz, .bz2, .xz, .zip, etc.) 8.5 html/xml files 8.6 JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) files 8.
